concept.title: plugins
concept.shortdesc: The plugins variable, in Netscape and Mozilla-based browsers, lists the plugins installed on the browser.

conbody.p: This variable is populated after the page code and before doPlugins is run.

p.note: This variable should only be read and never set.

conbody.p: You may read these values and copy them into props/eVars, but you should never alter them. This variable is introduced with version H.11 of the JavaScript file.

row.entry: IE Tab Plug-in;QuickTime Plug-in 7.1.6;Mozilla Default Plug-in;iTunes Application Detector;Adobe Acrobat;ActiveTouch General Plugin Container;Shockwave Flash;Microsoft Office 2003;Java(TM) Platform SE 6 U1;Windows Media Player Plug-in Dynamic Link Library;Microsoft® DRM;
